short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage your open tabs with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension that allows you to store your open tabs is sessions. You can then manage all your saved sessions, by opening or deleting a session.

To ask for new features, please visit the extension's repo : https://github.com/riadeb/Web-Squirrel
